content: Azure DevOps is a cloud-based set of development tools and services offered by Microsoft that provides a complete DevOps platform for software development teams to plan, build, test, and deploy software. It offers a wide range of features, including source code management, continuous integration/continuous delivery (CI/CD), project tracking and management, testing, artifact management, and collaboration tools for development teams. Azure DevOps supports various programming languages, platforms, and tools, making it a versatile solution for software development teams of any size. It can also be integrated with other Microsoft Azure services and third-party tools, allowing teams to create a customized DevOps pipeline that meets their unique needs.
